description: Redevelopment to provide 22 one bed flats  6 two bed flats  3 three bed flats  l4 two bed maisonetes  2 two bed houses  15 three bed houses with associated parking and landscaped areas and two retail units and one restaurant fronting Essex Road (as amended by letter dated 16th November 1988).Applicants plan nos. P1 Rev C; P2 Rev B; P3 Rev C; P4 Rev C; P5 Rev B; P6 Rev B; P7 Rev B.
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 41(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971 and to encourage early development of the site.
